title: Black screen of death mid game!
body:
Hi, so I have this problem thingy where sometimes in game, in a middle of a big fight I get some kind of a short lag where my screen goes black and the game gets stuck/freezes for about 1-3 seconds.
I have absolutely no idea why or how this is happenning, it happend to me 2 times already but one was in 6.18 version and the other one was in 6.19. (btw in the first time it happend, my screen went grey for a sec and then black, but in the second time, it only went black)
Im suspecting this might be drop hackers but I cant really tell :\
did anyone ever had this bug/lag thingy befor?
how can I fix it maybe?
HELP O_O

replies.body: This could be happening for a variety of reasons, but it sounds to me like there could be a driver or hardware issue that's crashing and trying to reload.  For your specific issue, I suggest going over the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out possibilities related to your drivers or game files.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some of those instructions!  Let me know if that helps!
